mapper.sql: SELECT /* StRtGrpBase.getStRtGrpBaseList */ RT_GRP_NO , SYS_GB_CD , RT_GRP_NM , TO_CHAR(APLY_STR_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') APLY_STR_DT , TO_CHAR(APLY_END_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') APLY_END_DT , USE_YN , SYS_MOD_ID , TO_CHAR(SYS_MOD_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') SYS_MOD_DTM FROM ST_RT_GRP_BASE WHERE RT_GRP_NO LIKE CONCAT(#{rtGrpNo}, '%') AND RT_GRP_NM LIKE CONCAT(#{rtGrpNm}, '%') AND SYS_GB_CD LIKE CONCAT(#{sysGbCd}, '%') ORDER BY RT_GRP_NO
